attributes.action: Remind the BBC that its initials stand for the British Broadcasting Corporation and NOT the English Broadcasting Corporation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any news or sport that involves England is deemed to be of UK wide interest whilst  
news from Wales, Scotland and probably Northern Ireland is only broadcast in the “region”. Is the BBC seeking a unique English identity, at the expense of others?  News from the “regions” needs to be catastrophic to get mentioned on UK-wide BBC. English sports and teams, even the Cotswold Olympics are shown UK-wide whilst “regional” leagues are almost totally ignored. Sponsorship follows the greater audience and the “regional” sports organisations suffer as a direct result. International matches and competitions are equally biased.  
Perhaps we should simply accept that BBC actually stands for the Biased Broadcasting Corporation.
